subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ के गुहिल-सिसोदिया राजवंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty of Mewar.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल मेवाड़ के गुहिल-सिसोदिया राजवंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which dynasty ruled over the region of Mewar from the 7th to the 12th century?
question_hi: मेवाड़ क्षेत्र पर 7वीं से 12वीं शताब्दी तक कौनसा राजवंश शासन करता था?
explanation_en: The Guhil-Sisodia dynasty ruled over the region of Mewar from the 7th to the 12th century.
explanation_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया राजवंश 7वीं से 12वीं शताब्दी तक मेवाड़ क्षेत्र पर शासन करता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the most powerful ruler of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश का सबसे शक्तिशाली शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Bhoja was the most powerful ruler of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: भोज प्रतिहार राजवंश का सबसे शक्तिशाली शासक था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which Chauhan ruler built the fort of Ajmer?
question_hi: अजमेर का किला किस चौहान शासक ने बनवाया था?
explanation_en: Ajaya Raj Chauhan built the fort of Ajmer.
explanation_hi: अजयराज चौहान ने अजमेर का किला बनवाया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the last ruler of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश का अंतिम शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Mahipala was the last ruler of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: महिपाल प्रतिहार राजवंश का अंतिम शासक था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which Guhil-Sisodia ruler built the fort of Kumbhalgarh?
question_hi: कुंभलगढ़ का किला किस गुहिल-सिसोदिया शासक ने बनवाया था?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha built the fort of Kumbhalgarh.
explanation_hi: राणा कुंभा ने कुंभलगढ़ का किला बनवाया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous Chauhan ruler who fought against Muhammad Ghori?
question_hi: मुहम्मद गोरी के विरुद्ध लड़ने वाला प्रसिद्ध चौहान शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the famous Chauhan ruler who fought against Muhammad Ghori.
explanation_hi: पृथ्वीराज चौहान मुहम्मद गोरी के विरुद्ध लड़ने वाला प्रसिद्ध चौहान शासक था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which Pratihar ruler is known for his patronage of art and literature?
question_hi: कला और साहित्य के पatronage के लिए कौनसा प्रतिहार शासक प्रसिद्ध है?
explanation_en: Bhoja is known for his patronage of art and literature.
explanation_hi: भोज कला और साहित्य के पatronage के लिए प्रसिद्ध है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान राजवंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Ajaya Raj Chauhan was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: अजयराज चौहान चौहान राजवंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which Guhil-Sisodia ruler is known for his bravery and military campaigns?
question_hi: कौनसा गुहिल-सिसोदिया शासक अपनी वीरता और सैन्य अभियानों के लिए प्रसिद्ध है?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap is known for his bravery and military campaigns.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप अपनी वीरता और सैन्य अभियानों के लिए प्रसिद्ध है।
